mapper.select: SELECT ask_boards.id, ask_boards.title, users.user_id, to_char(created, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as created FROM ask_boards, users WHERE ask_boards.author=users.id ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ask_boards(id, author, title, content, created) VALUES (seq_ask_pk.nextval, 2, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate)
